statements: SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender, diagnosis, admission_date FROM electronic_health_records;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, patient_age, patient_gender, diagnosis, patient_id FROM electronic_health_records;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM electronic_health_records WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, admission_date FROM electronic_health_records WHERE patient_gender = 'F';
SELECT * FROM electronic_health_records WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM electronic_health_records ORDER BY patient_name DESC, patient_age ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM electronic_health_records WHERE patient_gender='F' AND admission_date>'2021-01-01'
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM electronic_health_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY patient_age DESC
SELECT * FROM electronic_health_records WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND diagnosis IS NOT NULL
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, admission_date FROM electronic_health_records ORDER BY admission_date
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, patient_gender FROM patients GROUP BY patient_gender;
SELECT patient_name, patient_birthdate, patient_address FROM patients ORDER BY patient_birthdate DESC;
SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.diagnosis, medical_records.treatment FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'M'
SELECT patient_name, patient_birthdate FROM patients WHERE patient_birthdate BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31'
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.diagnosis FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, dob, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, address FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM Conditions WHERE diagnosis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT name, dob FROM Patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT p.name, c.condition FROM Patients p JOIN Conditions c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id WHERE c.diagnosis_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT m.medication_name, m.dosage, m.frequency, p.name FROM Medications m JOIN Patients p ON m.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE m.frequency = 'Twice a day';

SELECT p.name, c.condition, m.medication_name FROM Patients p JOIN Conditions c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id JOIN Medications m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE c.condition='Diabetes' AND m.dosage='500mg';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT treatment, illness FROM MedicalHistory ORDER BY medical_id DESC;
SELECT name, specialization FROM Doctors WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM MedicalHistory WHERE illness LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT Patients.name, Appointments.appointment_date FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.id = Appointments.patient_id;
SELECT Doctors.name, Doctors.specialization, Appointments.appointment_date FROM Doctors JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital FROM doctors ORDER BY specialty ASC;
SELECT appointment_date, notes FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, address, phone_number FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F'
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital FROM doctors
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id
SELECT doctor_name, patient_name, appointment_date, notes FROM doctors JOIN appointments ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id
